price: 8. Mpe bampunda na ba bighal(1) na ba hamir(2) mpo bomatela yango na botamboli, mpe misusu mizali sé кака тропа bonzenga. Мре azali kokela maye bino boyebi te.
arabic: وَٱلۡخَيۡلَ وَٱلۡبِغَالَ وَٱلۡحَمِيرَ لِتَرۡكَبُوهَا وَزِينَةٗۚ وَيَخۡلُقُ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes:
1 Bighal: Ezali bosangani ya mpunda na aane ebotaka yango.
2  Hamir: Ezali ba niama oyo bamatelaka, ezuamaka mingi na ba mboka ya esobe. Na lopoto (ânes).

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wal-khayla wal-bighāla wal-ḥamīra litarkabūhā wazīnatan wayakhluqu mā lā taʿlamūna
